728833f-a.text:
63 Forest Ave., north side, between Duer Lane and Haven Esplanade, ahowing the Louis A. Dreyfus residence.
May 1927.
P. L. Sperm.
728833f-a.folder: Forest Avenue & Duer Lane, Staten Island, NY

728841f-b.text:
(1)
Forest Ave. (background), west from Duer Lane to Haven Esplanade. The houses are on the north side of the avenue. The view is across the northeastern edge of Silver Lake Park.
April 16, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
July s, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
